#2. Load & Clean Data
```{r load clean data, include=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
#PKD & LC (PENGUIN & CROCODILE)
data <- read.csv(fs::path(dir.dat,"Data Harmonization","Data Clean","harmonized_dataset.csv"),na="")
data <- data %>% 
  arrange(screen_date) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(across(where(negate(is.numeric)), ~ ifelse(all(is.na(.x)), NA_character_, first(na.omit(.x)))),
                   across(where(is.numeric), ~ ifelse(all(is.na(.x)), NA_real_, first(na.omit(.x)))),
                   .by = c(record_id, visit))

# data  <- data %>% 
#   filter(visit=="baseline") %>%
#   filter(study=="PENGUIN" | study=="CROCODILE"|study=="RENAL-HEIR" | study=="RENAL-HEIRitage") %>% 
#   dplyr::select(record_id,group,age,sex,race,bmi,triglycerides,hba1c,ab40_avg_conc,ab42_avg_conc,
#                 tau_avg_conc,nfl_avg_conc,gfap_avg_conc,
#                 ptau_181_avg_conc,ptau_217_avg_conc) %>% 
#   filter(group=="Lean Control" | group=="PKD")
data  <- data %>% 
  filter(visit=="baseline") %>%
  filter(study=="PENGUIN" | study=="CROCODILE") %>% 
  dplyr::select(record_id,group,age,sex,race,bmi,triglycerides,hba1c,eGFR_CKD_epi,gfr_bsa_plasma,ab40_avg_conc,ab42_avg_conc,tau_avg_conc,nfl_avg_conc,gfap_avg_conc,ptau_181_avg_conc,ptau_217_avg_conc,total_kidney_volume_ml,ht_adj_tkv) %>% 
  filter(group=="Lean Control" | group=="PKD")

data2 <- data %>% 
  filter(group=="PKD")


```


#3. Analysis
#PKD vs LC 
```{r}
#Analyze difference in quanterix variables (y) by group (LC vs. PKD) (x)
qx_var <- c("ab40_avg_conc","ab42_avg_conc","tau_avg_conc",
            "nfl_avg_conc","gfap_avg_conc","ptau_181_avg_conc","ptau_217_avg_conc")

hist(data$ab40_avg_conc)
hist(data$ab42_avg_conc)
hist(data$tau_avg_conc)
hist(data$nfl_avg_conc)
hist(data$gfap_avg_conc)
hist(data$ptau_181_avg_conc)
hist(data$ptau_217_avg_conc)
# 
# data <- data %>% 
#   mutate(across(all_of(qx_var),~log(.),.names = "{.col}_log"))

data$group <- factor(data$group)
data$group <- relevel(data$group,"Lean Control")

#Linear regression
total_results <- data.frame()
for (y in qx_var) {
  m0 <- as.formula(paste0(y,"~ group"))
  model0 <- lm(m0,data=data)
  beta <- summary(model0)$coef[2,1]
  pval <- summary(model0)$coef[2,4]
  sig <- ifelse(pval<0.05,"*","")
  results <- data.frame(Variable=y,Group=names(model0$coefficients[2]),Beta=beta,PValue=pval,Significant=sig)
  total_results <- rbind(total_results,results)
}

#Check assumptions
for (y in qx_var) {
  m0 <- as.formula(paste0(y,"~ group"))
  model0 <- lm(m0,data=data)
  residuals <- resid(model0)
# 2. QQ plot to check normality of residuals
print(qqnorm(residuals))
qqline(residuals, col = "red")

}
```

```{r}
total_results <- data.frame()
for (y in qx_var) {
  m0 <- as.formula(paste0(y,"~ total_kidney_volume_ml"))
  model0 <- lm(m0,data=data2)
  beta <- summary(model0)$coef[2,1]
  pval <- summary(model0)$coef[2,4]
  sig <- ifelse(pval<0.05,"*","")
  results <- data.frame(Variable=y,Group=names(model0$coefficients[2]),Beta=beta,PValue=pval,Significant=sig)
  total_results <- rbind(total_results,results)
}

total_results <- data.frame()
for (y in qx_var) {
# Pearson correlation instead of linear regression
cor_result <- cor.test(data2[[y]], data2$total_kidney_volume_ml)

# Extract correlation coefficient and p-value
beta <- cor_result$estimate  # Pearson correlation coefficient
pval <- cor_result$p.value
sig <- ifelse(pval < 0.05, "*", "")
  results <- data.frame(Variable=y,TKV="Total Kidney Volume",Corr=beta,PValue=pval,Significant=sig)
  total_results <- rbind(total_results,results)
}
```

###i. All points
```{r}
exposure <- c(proteins,metabolites)
outcome  <- c("ab40_avg_conc","ab42_avg_conc","tau_avg_conc",
              "nfl_avg_conc","gfap_avg_conc","ptau_181_avg_conc","ptau_217_avg_conc")
covars <- c("age","sex","group")
#Log transform all exposure variables: 
dat_CROC <- dat_CROC %>% 
  mutate(across(all_of(exposure),~log(.),.names = "{.col}_log"))
dat_CROC <- dat_CROC %>% 
  mutate(across(all_of(exposure),~((.-mean(.,na.rm=T))/sd(.,na.rm=T)),.names = "{.col}_scale"))
exposure_scale <- paste0(exposure,"_scale")
dat_CROC <- dat_CROC %>% 
  mutate(across(all_of(exposure_scale),~((.-mean(.,na.rm=T))/sd(.,na.rm=T)),.names = "{.col}_log"))

exposure_log <- paste0(exposure,"_log")
exposure_log_scale <- paste0(exposure_scale,"_log")
dat_CROC <- dat_CROC %>% 
  mutate(across(all_of(outcome),~((.-mean(.,na.rm=T))/sd(.,na.rm=T)),.names = "{.col}_scale"))
outcome_scale <- paste0(outcome,"_scale")

#No Interaction Term with group
results <- data.frame()
for (feature in exposure_log_scale) {
```

```{r JIVE and Mediation Analysis,echo=F,include=T}
get_min_name <- function(rt_diff, name) {
  rt_diff_values <- as.numeric(unlist(strsplit(rt_diff, "; ")))
  name_values <- unlist(strsplit(name, "; "))
  
  min_index <- which.min(rt_diff_values)
  min_name <- name_values[min_index]
  
  return(min_name)

  min_value <- min(row, na.rm = TRUE)
  min_name <- names(row)[which.min(ifelse(is.na(row), Inf, row))]
```

```{r MCAR Test, include=F}
  mutate(across(all_of(mic.name),~ifelse(!is.na(.),1,0)))
mic2 <- mic[,c(1:16,108:474)]
mic3 <- mic[,c(1:16)]

mic2 <- mic2 %>%
  rename(missing=Bifidobacterium)
mic2$missing <- ifelse(mic2$missing==0,NA,1)
mic2 <- as.data.frame(mic2)
# mcar_test(mic2)
mic3 <- mic3 %>% 
  rename(missing=Bifidobacterium)
mic3$missing <- ifelse(mic3$missing==0,NA,1)
mic3 <- as.data.frame(mic3)
mcar_test(mic3)

vars <- colnames(mic2)[-16]
pvals <- data.frame()
for (x in vars){
  formula <- as.formula(paste0("missing ~ ",x))
  m1 <- glm(formula, data = mic2, family = "binomial")
  p <- summary(m1)$coef[2,4]
  pvalues <- data.frame(Value = x,P=p)
  pvals <- rbind(pvals,pvalues)
}

pvals$fdr <- p.adjust(pvals$P, method = "fdr")

vars <- colnames(mic3)[-9]
pvals <- data.frame()
for (x in vars){

  m1 <- glm(formula, data = mic3, family = "binomial")
  p <- summary(m1)$coef[2,4]
  pvalues <- data.frame(Value = x,P=p)
  pvals <- rbind(pvals,pvalues)
}

pvals$fdr <- p.adjust(pvals$P, method = "fdr")
```
